title: Neural Stem Cell Assays

Neural Stem Cell Assays

English | ISBN: 1118308255 | 2015 | 288 pages | PDF | 8 MB

Including an overview of progress made in the field over the past decade, Neural Stem Cell Assays provides a detailed and comprehensive review of the basic methods for neural stem cell cultures. This is an excellent source of information for academic, pharmaceutic and biotechnology researchers
